title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing intercourse in a dream

preview.html: Watching intercourse in a dream has many connotations that indicate good and evil in some interpretations, either achieving a prominent position or achieving ambitions, some of which portend evil and the emergence of problems and disagreements that are considered a bad omen. Seeing intercourse in a dream Seeing intercourse with fear in a dream is evidence of the presence of problems, disagreements, and pressures in life. The dream may lead to sadness and unhappiness. When an unmarried or unmarried young man gets married in a dream, this indicates a marriage contract or a soon-to-be marriage. In the event that a married woman is seen having sexual intercourse with her husband, this symbolizes getting rid of judgments between them, and the beginning of a new phase that expresses In which she expresses her sincere and sincere feelings towards him and her intense love for him. Seeing a man copulating with a girl, but he does not know her, indicates his desire to marry a beautiful and fair girl and he thinks about her a lot. A Christian woman who sees intercourse in her dream is a sign of abundant goodness and livelihood. If a man has intercourse with a lion In his dream, it means victory over enemies and achieving a high position in his work. Seeing intercourse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin When interpreting a dreamer’s vision of intercourse with a woman or a woman seeing a man having intercourse with her in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, it indicates an abundance of goodness and good luck for the person who has intercourse with him. In the event that one sees incest in a dream, this is evidence of many benefits and abundant benefits for both parties. Seeing sexual intercourse in a dream generally means that you will achieve what you seek and achieve high ambitions and goals. If the dreamer sees that he is marrying someone who has a high and prestigious status This indicates that he has reached a high position in the country. If an unmarried young man sees himself breaking the hymen, this indicates his marriage to a beautiful girl, but when the dreamer sees himself having sex with a man, this indicates a deception that is near. Seeing intercourse in a woman’s dream SinglenessWhen a dark-skinned man sleeps with an unmarried girl, but she feels alienated from him, it is considered an unpopular vision, which always symbolizes the emergence of some evil in the dreamer’s life as a result of her appearing in many problems and disputes that destroy her life. If the girl sees that she is in a relationship with her lover Or with someone she wants to marry and she was happy in her dream, this indicates the good news that will happen in her life as a result of this young man marrying her in reality and that he will do so. She will have the best and righteous husband. An unmarried woman seeing in her dream that she has an illicit relationship with a strange man, but at the same time she remembers that she may have met him and he may be the frequent driver or seller, and the vision shows a sense of ease and comfort. She was not found by her family. Seeing sexual intercourse in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in her dream that she is marrying her husband is considered a favorite dream that symbolizes the occurrence of many positive changes for the better, whether in her personal or professional life. In the event of an illicit relationship with a strange woman in a dream For a man, this is evidence of a lawful life and abundant resources. Seeing intercourse in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream indicates the collapse of problems and worries, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream by Ibn Shirin is evidence that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness and satisfaction in his life. Also, seeing Reciting Surat Al-Imran in a dream indicates that it is one of the good visions that indicate the end of worries and sorrows and relief from anxiety and distress. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream for a single womanSeeing Surat Al-Imran in an unmarried girl’s dream is good news that she will live a peaceful life free of problems and obstacles. Dreaming of reciting Surat Al-Imran for an unmarried woman may indicate that it is one of the visions that indicate a close marriage in her life, and God knows best. Also, seeing Surat Al-Imran recited in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her purity and enjoyment of a beautiful and calm spirit. Seeing the Qur’an recited over a dead person. In a dream, it indicates her marriage to one of her relatives, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Imran, this indicates the disappearance of her worries and her imminent pregnancy. Also, seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream for a married woman indicates a lot Of sustenance and her husband entering a new job. Seeing Surat Al-Imran hanging in the sky for a married woman in her dream is considered the culmination of her wishes and will come true. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman dreams of reading Surat Al-Imran, this means that she will give birth and become pregnant soon. A pregnant woman’s dream of reading the Qur’an can be considered While she is in the bathroom, it is a sign of some problems in her life or pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Imran in a dream for a man: If an unmarried person dreams that he is reading Surat Al-Imran, this means that his worries will disappear and he will enter into a new job. Likewise, if an unmarried man is seen reading Surat Al-Imran And he preserves it well, as this indicates his marriage to a good girl. Also, seeing Surat Al-Imran hanging for a married man indicates victory in work or victory over enemies, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Imran recited in the jinn. Also, seeing Surat Al-Imran recited over the jinn in a dream is Good news for the dreamer’s victory over all enemies and haters close to him. Also, if one sees in a dream that he is reciting Surat Al-Imran over the jinn, this indicates the great victory that he will achieve. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you. As soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about naked women for a single woman according to the great dream interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of nudity for a single woman Likewise, nudity in a dream for a single woman is one of the interpretations that accept classification within visions of good and accept classification within visions of evil. The doctrine of the sheikhs of dream interpretation in interpreting a dream of nudity in a dream for an unmarried woman is to examine the details of the dream and match it with the dreamer's condition. Basically, for interpreting dreams, being naked in a dream means that you rely on other symbols in the vision that clarify what is meant by it. A dream of removing clothes or a girl appearing naked can indicate the safety of the dreamer from evil deeds and the deception of envy, but at the same time with other symbols it can be interpreted as a loss and separation from loved ones. Interpretation of a dream of nudity for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Sheikh interpreter of dreams Muhammad bin Sirin links nudity in a dream to the place where the dreamer appears in the dream. Being naked in front of a group of people is interpreted by Ibn Sirin with a scandal in public, while nudity alone indicates the appearance of a hidden enemy who was waiting for the dreamer. Ibn Sirin interprets being naked in a dream about a living person as different from being naked in a dream about a living person or a person who saw himself naked in Dream. Interpretation of naked dreams for a single woman from Al-Nabulsi Imam Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi expands on the interpretation of a dream of nudity for an unmarried woman, initially agreeing with what Ibn Sirin presented for his interpretation and then adding some other cases to it. What Al-Nabulsi narrated: If a girl takes off her clothes in a dream and her nudity is exposed without her knowledge, she is striving for something that is difficult for her, and she will work hard to achieve it. Al-Nabulsi said in the interpretation of a dream of nudity for an unmarried woman, “And whoever sees that he is naked and does not realize his nudity and is not ashamed of people, he exaggerates in something and gets tired.” He also added to Ibn Sirin’s interpretations that a woman’s nudity in a dream can be a separation from her home. Interpretation of a dream of nakedness for a sick unmarried woman Being naked in a dream for a sick girl is one of the good, good and commendable visions suggested by the people of interpretation. The most likely opinion among dream interpreters is that a sick girl should strip in a dream of a yellow, black or red dress, a harbinger of recovery from her illness. Al-Nabulsi says, “And if the patient sees that he took off His clothes in a yellow dress, this indicates his recovery, as well as red and black clothes. However, the interpreters hated the reluctance of the sick woman to take off her clothes in a dream and considered it a hateful dream. They said in their interpretations that the patient taking off her clothes in a dream unintentionally is a sign that the days of her life are over. Interpretation of a dream of taking off his clothes in a dream for a single woman The owners of interpretation and interpreters of dreams and visions have many opinions about the interpretation of a dream of nakedness in a dream for a single woman. They link their interpretations of the dream to the numbers and accompanying symbols that reveal the truth of the vision and its purpose. Many interpreters of dreams have argued that if a girl takes off her clothes in a dream without anyone seeing her, the dream indicates the emergence of an enemy whom she considers a friend. And that this enemy was showing the owner of the vision friendship and love, and did not explicitly declare his hostility to the

They link their interpretations of the dream to the accompanying numbers and symbols that reveal the truth and purpose of the vision. Many dream interpreters have argued that If a girl takes off her clothes in a dream without anyone seeing her, the dream indicates the appearance of an enemy that she considers a friend. This enemy was showing friendship and love to the dreamer, and did not explicitly declare his hostility to the dreamer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lost son or friend in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see the loss of a boy or boy in a dream. This vision is one of the visions that frequently appears in a dream, so interpretation scholars have worked hard to find clear explanations for this. The reason is that the dreamers feel a state of discomfort, anxiety, and tension as a result of this vision. In reality, they cannot A person bears the loss or loss of his son, so what is the situation if these disturbing situations are seen in a dream? You will learn about that during the dream interpretation of seeing the loss of a son or boy in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the loss of a son or boy for an unmarried woman. It is certain that this vision carries connotations and signs. Many are clear, whether it brings evil or good, and we will learn that through the following lines: When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her son is missing, or the son of a relative or neighbor. This indicates the appearance of misfortune, as well as exposure to distress that will happen to the unmarried girl. While an unmarried young man who sees in a dream that his son is missing. Which indicates that this bachelor will suffer material and financial losses. Moreover, he will lose everything he dreamed of and looked forward to forever. Or it may happen in his life that he loses the people he trusts and those who are close to him. From him as a family member or friend. In the event that the missing person is a relative of the unmarried young man or unmarried girl. For example, to a relative’s son, a nephew, a sister’s son, a cousin, or others. Certainly, this indicates that the dreamer He doubts it, and therefore he must quickly reveal the facts of this matter. Whereas in the case that the child in the dream is the son of an unmarried person, or an unmarried girl. Certainly, this indicates the dreamer’s compensation for financial losses and their return, or perhaps the return of some of them. Interpretation Dream of seeing a lost sonSee also: Interpretation of a dream of losing a daughter in a dream and its repercussions. She dreams of losing a son or child from a married woman. What a married woman longs for most in her life is her children. She is hurt by their evil and rejoices in their joy. The same situation in a dream, where she is worried and seeks an explanation for it, which is as follows: If a married woman sees that her child is lost in a dream, this indicates that there is a lot of sorrow. In addition, crying is a result of illnesses. Losing a child without the woman finding him symbolizes... A lot of sorrows and distress in her life. Whereas, if she finds this son in a dream, all the fears, anxieties, and sorrows that she was exposed to will end. If this boy is not her son, then he is one of the people she knows. This showed that there are some people that the wife will know and she is trying to find many Problems. A woman who is working to destroy her married life, in addition to the poverty and hardships of life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lost son. See also: Interpretation of a dream about losing shoes and then finding them in a dream. Seeing the loss of a son or child by a pregnant woman. Here it should be noted that most of what a pregnant woman thinks about is Her new baby, her fetus, and her children. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream the loss of her son, whether it is her son in life or the fetus

title: Interpretation of renting a small boat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about renting a small boat in a dream: Seeing a boat in a dream is one of the visions that we may see in a dream, but we do not know its meaning, even though it has many different meanings, connotations and interpretations, as it indicates safety and distance from destruction and the course of sins and appears at other times, There are many worries, sorrows and problems. The interpretation of this vision depends on the situation in which the dreamer saw the ship in his dream, and according to whether the one who saw the ship was a man, a woman, or an unmarried girl, which we will learn about through this article in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of renting a small boat in a dream: Jurists say in Interpretation of dreams: Seeing a boat in a dream indicates many things worthy of praise, such as if a person sees in his dream that he is boarding a ship at sea, then this vision indicates that he is far from trouble and disaster. Of sins. But if a person sees in his dream that he is crossing the sea in a ship without facing any of the troubles and problems, this means that the dreamer will be freed from debts and his worries will go away. If he is suffering from poverty, then this vision shows that he will get rid of poverty and will get a lot of money. As for If he sees that he is renting a ship and goes with him on the sea, but the ship sank, then this vision indicates a great loss for the dreamer, and this vision is for divorce. But if a young man sees in his dream that he is standing on a small boat, then this vision indicates that he will get married soon, but if he sees that he Standing on a boat means that he will soon obtain an important position. Interpretation of a dream about renting a small boat for a married woman: Dream interpretation scholars say that if a woman sees in her dream that she is renting a small boat and traveling with it far away from people, then this vision indicates that she is suffering from many worries, problems, and pressures and wishes to get rid of them and stay away. Those around her are safe, and this indicates that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she suffers from in her life. If a married woman dreams that she is riding a small, new boat, then this vision indicates that she will soon give birth to good offspring, but if she is pregnant, this vision indicates that the married woman will give birth and give birth. . Easy and easy. But if she sees that she is riding a large boat and taking it away, then this vision shows that she will get a lot of money, and this vision shows love, stability, and an intimate relationship between her and her family and husband. Interpretation of the vision of renting and driving a small boat in an unmarried girl’s dream: Scientists say Dream Interpretation: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is riding a small boat and taking risks, then this vision indicates that she will face a large group of problems and many difficulties, but she will overcome them easily. In her life. If she sees that she is anchored in a boat on the shore, this vision indicates that the unmarried girl will reach safety and get married soon, but if she is suffering from an illness, this indicates that she will get rid of the problems and diseases that she suffers from in her life. Interpretation of seeing a ship Sinking in a dream: Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a ship drowning

title: What is the interpretation of the neck in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The neck in a dream and its interpretation: The earring is one of the decorative tools worn by girls and women, and the materials from which the earring is made differ, so we find the earring made of gold, the earring made of silver, and the accessory made of ordinary metals. As for seeing it in a dream, we find that it has many interpretations that differ depending on the condition and gender of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about neck: If you see an earring without wearing it in a dream, this means that you will hear happy news, whether the dreamer is a man or a woman. A man who sees a beautiful woman wearing an elegant earring in His dream means that he will benefit from his trade and gain great fame in his field. He will overcome all obstacles and his position will be superior to all his merchant competitors. If a bachelor sees in his dream that he is wearing an earring in one ear, this means that he will marry a woman and her condition will be like the earring, that is, if the earring Beautiful, his wife. He will be blessed with beautiful emeralds, pearls, and coral beads, and this is evidence that he will have his share of the world if he marries two women. Ibn Sirin explains that the dreamer puts the earring in one ear. This means that the dreamer will be interested in memorizing and reciting the Qur’an. Losing an earring or earring in a dream is one of the most unpleasant visions. Because it indicates the dreamer’s illness or the loss of someone he loves very much. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he forgot his earring somewhere, this means that he will fall into many troubles and problems related to the inheritance money, and therefore the problems will be between him and his brothers because of this money. The neck in a dream is for a woman Pregnant When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a golden earring, this means that God is honoring her by giving birth to a male child, and if she sees that she is wearing a silver earring, this means that he will bless her. With a baby girl. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her throat has fine dust, and she cleans it, this means that her baby will be born. He will be born sick, but God will heal him. title: Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream in detail by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I likeFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of a dream about corn in a dream in detail by Al-Nabulsi, corn usually wears good skin in a dream, whether it is an increase in livelihood, success, recovery from an illness or good in general, but there may be some places where corn brings a quote from Negative interpretation from the Shamloul website. Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream: Dreams of corn vary between looking at it, eating it, selling it, or buying it. In the following words, we will present to you the most important interpretations. Interpretation of a vision of harvesting corn. Whoever dreams that he is picking corn, this is a beautiful dream and indicates kindness and closeness to happiness. As for whoever sees in a dream that others are harvesting corn, it is interpreted that the sleeper is one of those who make others happy. Interpretation of a vision of green cornWho sees In a dream or dreaming that he sees green corn, the green corn here indicates the marriage of any woman or a close husband. As for the one who gave birth, he stored green corn, this means that the sleeper will realize what he longs for in life. Interpretation of seeing corn in a pregnant woman’s dream If the pregnant woman sees corn on a piece of Bread, the interpretation of the dream is that she will feel happy, but it will not last and will not be long, and God knows best. But if a pregnant woman sees corn planted in the field, the meaning of the dream is that she will give birth easily, God willing. Interpretation of a married woman’s vision of corn If a married woman sees green corn, she will have a new home, and God I know. Different interpretations of seeing corn in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating grilled corn, the corn here indicates happiness, but this is not the truth. As for the dreamer, he walks in the middle of a field planted with corn, and it usually indicates goodness and abundance of food, God willing. But if the patient dreams that he He grills corn in the interpretation of the dream. He is likely to recover from his illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing rotten corn in a dream: This dream is considered a dream that brings unpleasant news and general interpretations. If the sleeper dreams that he sees rotten corn, whether in the field or in another place that the sleeper sees, then this is his interpretation, and God knows that the sleeper will feel very disappointed. As for the one who dreams of buying corn, the corn here means that the sleeper is going through difficult and harsh financial circumstances. Corn carries different interpretations for the sleeper. Whether male, married or pregnant. Viewing of corn is varied, including eating, splitting, buying, planting, or picking. We have explained the most important ones. Among them, according to the interpretations of interpreters around the world in the field of dreams.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a Qur’an competition in a dream

preview.html: Competition for interpreting a dream about the Qur’an in a dream. We may find that some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about a competition for the Qur’an in a dream, one of the dreams in which many people wanted to know the interpretation of this dream. Interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a Quran competition in a dream Whoever sees in his dream that he participated in a Quran competition, can indicate excellence in life and success. Dreaming about a Quran competition in a dream can indicate positive changes that are occurring In the life of the dreamer during this period. If one sees that he participated in a Qur’an competition and won, this may indicate the confidence that the dreamer feels during this period. When a person sees a Qur’an competition in a dream, perhaps this indicates blessings and happiness in life during this time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a beauty contest in a dream: Whoever dreams of entering beauty pageants may indicate meeting a long-lost person, thanks to God. A beauty pageant in a dream can indicate the grace and kindness that the dreamer will gain during this time. Seeing a woman participating in Beauty pageant competitions indicate the financial gains that she achieves during this time. A woman’s vision may indicate that she went to a beauty pageant for the positive changes that occur in her life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about competing in a dream: Anyone can dream that he will participate in a competition Running may indicate his search for an extensive diet. Dreaming of a running competition in a dream may indicate halal money that the dreamer obtains during this period. Seeing a running race in a dream may indicate positive changes in the dreamer’s life during that period. Anyone who dreams can That he went to an ongoing competition indicates new changes in the dreamer’s life at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a cooking competition in a dream: The vision of going to a cooking competition to obtain some material gains that the dreamer achieves in those days. If one sees that he went to a cooking competition This may indicate good changes that may occur in the dreamer’s life in the coming period. Seeing a cooking competition in a dream may indicate a job that the dreamer will obtain or a promotion at work, thanks to God. Seeing a cooking competition in a dream may indicate the success that the dreamer will achieve during this period. Period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about joining a club in a dream: Anyone who dreams of participating in a sports club may indicate the happy changes that occurred in the life of that owner during that period. Seeing a sports club in a dream can indicate how much the dreamer cares about his health. Seeing going To a social club in a dream indicates some new qualities present in the dreamer at that time. In the event that someone sees that he went to the gym in a dream, this may indicate changes in his life during these days. Interpretation of a dream about bicycle racing in a dream. Anyone can dream That he went to a bicycle race indicates that he is someone who is in a hurry to make a decision

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer by Ibn Sirin - the most accurate interpretations

preview.html: Dreaming about hearing the call to prayer or repeating it in a dream is one of the popular visions among Muslims in general, and it also carries many clues that a person would like to know. The person is the person who hears the call. In addition to the state that a person feels when hearing the call to prayer, each of them symbolizes many meanings that clearly affect the life of the viewer. Because the call to prayer indicates a warning to perform one of the duties that a Muslim must perform in the five daily prayers. So if one sees That he is called to pray, this indicates the goodness and blessing that the Lord will reap in his future. While the dream of a person who performs prayer after hearing the call to prayer indicates God’s response to the prayer of performing Umrah or Hajj. If one sees that he is called to pray in a well, this indicates the extent of his love for people. For the dreamer. While in the case of standing on a hill to recite the call to prayer, it indicates the high position that the fortuneteller will reach. However, if a person sees that he hears the call and feels angry and does not want that sound, this indicates the presence of unwanted people in his life due to their bad reputation. Read Also: Washing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about calling to prayer. The interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream shows evidence in the life of the fortuneteller that conveys many events and news that the person is expected to be exposed to, whether good or bad. And whoever sees that he is calling for prayer at the Kaaba, this indicates the spread of strife among people. While in the case of the call to prayer inside the Kaaba, it indicates unpleasant news. If a person dreams of a call to prayer in his home, this indicates the death of his relative, whether he is a son or a sister. While in the case of hearing it on the rooftops of neighbors, it shows a lack of trust towards them. If Hearing the call to prayer in an unclean place, this indicates that this person has a bad reputation. If someone sees him calling for prayer in the desert, this indicates that he will be a spy. While the call to prayer in a hole indicates traveling with relatives. We recommend: Interpretation of supplication in a dream. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream. Hearing The call to prayer in a dream varies depending on the situation in which the viewer is, single or married, or the place in which he is standing as well, with the difference between the person who hears this call and whether he feels happy to hear it or not. I want it. In the event that a single person hears the call to prayer, it expresses the goodness that she will receive. While he listens to the call to prayer and the monarch does not want it, this indicates that there are people in his life who have a bad reputation. Hearing the call to prayer in a single’s dream. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream indicates good news that she will receive , which is expected to be a sermon in the near future. Whereas in the event that an unmarried woman performs the call to prayer in the bathroom, she brings bad news or that she is a disreputable girl. In the event that an unmarried woman utters incomprehensible words, this indicates the injustice that This girl practices it towards others, as long as she changes the words in the dream. In the case of a single woman who dreams that she is calling for

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about an airplane?  What are his most important interpretations?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an airplane: One of the visions that has aroused the interest of many is its horror and its great importance in our daily lives, which makes many people want to know the meaning of its fall and escape. Or that I was involved in a plane accident, which prompted us to collect the opinions of many lawyers to put them in your hands in this article. Interpretation of a dream about an plane: The plane is considered one of the most important means of transportation that we use in our daily lives, so seeing it in a dream is a very natural thing that can happen, and we explain its meaning as follows: If the dreamer sees the plane in the air in her dream, this symbolizes the presence of many goals in her imagination, which she pursues and strives to achieve a large part of them in less time than she had previously set for herself. A man sees in his dream that he is flying a plane, his vision suggests He is an ambitious person who seeks to achieve a great and distinguished financial entity through which he can prove his ability to plant his name in it. Labor market. Interpretation of a dream about an airplane by Ibn Sirin. Similar to the interpretations of the great scholar Ibn Sirin in interpreting the vision of various types of transportation, seeing an airplane in a dream shows a lot of goodness and blessing in one’s life and a good aura for reaching the dreamer’s goal in the easiest way possible. While the woman who sees in Her dream is of a plane and she is driving it to move from one place to another at high speed. This is one of those visions that are not taken into account, and are not interpreted in any way because they are not serious and she considers them. It is just a dream for her. The young man who sees himself on the plane, his vision revolves around him achieving many beautiful things in his life thanks to his response to his prayers, his constant supplication to the Lord Almighty, and the performance of his prayers at the appropriate time. To know Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type a site about secrets Interpretation of dreams... You will find everything you are looking for. Interpretation of escaping in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq did not think about airplanes in his time, but he explained the vision of the many means of transportation at that time. Therefore, the interpretation of flying in the dreamer’s dream was as follows: If the dreamer sees that he is flying in a plane from one place to another with the intention of traveling, this indicates the success of his efforts in life and good news for him that he will hear happy news in the coming days that will bring him happiness. Joy and happiness in his heart. While the woman who sees herself piloting a plane and flying in the sky, what she saw symbolizes her integrity, balance, and mental well-being, which gives her many beautiful and special things in her life and makes her appreciated and respected by many. Interpretation of a dream about an airplane for a single womanIf a woman sees An unmarried woman sees a plane in her dream, as this symbolizes her many ambitions in life and her desire to reach many distant horizons, which at first seem impossible to reach, but in the end she can achieve them and enjoy the fruits of her effort. The girl who sees in her dream that she is inside a large, luxurious plane and a person A famous person is sitting next to her and has a good reputation in the world. She explains what she saw by saying that one day she will have the ability to attract attention and occupy a high position.
